pkgmetadata.longdescription: # eBusdPyeBusd python integration library for HomeAssistant## Getting StartedThese instructions will get you a copy of the project up and running on your local machine for development and testing purposes. See deployment for notes on how to deploy the project on a live system.## Authors* **Marco Toni** - *Initial work* - [CrazYoshi](https://github.com/crazyoshi)* **john30** - *ebusd deamon* - [john30](https://github.com/john30/ebusd)## LicenseThis project is licensed under the GPLv3 License
